fields.name: AadConfiguration
fields.description: The Azure Active Directory Integration properties.

fields.name: AdministratorConfiguration
fields.description: The administrative credentials that will be applied to the control plane and agent pool nodes that do not specify their own values.

fields.name: AttachedNetworkIds
fields.description: The full list of network resource IDs that are attached to this cluster, including those attached only to specific agent pools.

fields.name: AvailableUpgrades
fields.description: The list of versions that this Kubernetes cluster can be upgraded to.

fields.name: ClusterId
fields.description: The resource ID of the Network Cloud cluster.

fields.name: ConnectedClusterId
fields.description: The resource ID of the connected cluster set up when this Kubernetes cluster is created.

fields.name: ControlPlaneKubernetesVersion
fields.description: The current running version of Kubernetes on the control plane.

fields.name: ControlPlaneNodeConfiguration
fields.description: The defining characteristics of the control plane for this Kubernetes Cluster.

fields.name: DetailedStatus
fields.description: The current status of the Kubernetes cluster.

fields.name: DetailedStatusMessage
fields.description: The descriptive message about the current detailed status.

fields.name: InitialAgentPoolConfigurations
fields.description: The agent pools that are created with this Kubernetes cluster for running critical system services and workloads. This data in this field is only used during creation, and the field will be empty following the creation of the Kubernetes Cluster. After creation, the management of agent pools is done using the agentPools sub-resource.

fields.name: KubernetesVersion
fields.description: The Kubernetes version for this cluster. Accepts n.n, n.n.n, and n.n.n-n format. The interpreted version used will be resolved into this field after creation or update.

fields.name: ManagedResourceGroupConfiguration
fields.description: The configuration of the managed resource group associated with the resource.

fields.name: NetworkConfiguration
fields.description: The configuration of the Kubernetes cluster networking, including the attachment of networks that span the cluster.

fields.name: Nodes
fields.description: The details of the nodes in this cluster.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state of the Kubernetes cluster resource.
